pereda (19) perawaruwe mahanuwara kandi siti sentarhidi pawathi madhya hamuwakadi amathiwaraya me baw sandahan kaleya.jalaya prajawa ha saubhagya yana themawa yatathe pawathwena mema jathyanthara samuluwata ratawal rasaka jala sampadana amathiwaru ha wishaya pilibanda wisheshagnyawarun wishala pirisak sahabhagi wana bawada amathiwaraya kiya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen agosthu 22 aarambha wana mema jathyanthara samuluwata samagamiwa kandi siti sentarhidi pradarshanayakda pawathwe.

tharagaya athhara damu bawa niwedanaya kirimath samaga sidni krikat kridanganaye siti 22,521ka narambaanno “hu” kiyamin owunge udahasa ha aprasadaya pala kara sitiyaha.thamange kandayamata wadi wasi sahagatha thaththwayak thibiyadi tharagaya yali aarambha kirimata asamath wima ha me sancharayata pera enam mita masa thunakata ihathadi nawasilanthayata erehiwa pallekale di mita wada asiru kalagunika thaththwayan paradawu mahela jayawardhanatada me thiranaya nisa thaman thula hatagath kalakirima sangawa gena sitimata nohaki wiya.ek tharagamalawakin eelaga tharagamalawata thibena nithiwala nogalapima pilibandawa karunu pahada dena lesata thama kandayama jagath krikat kawunsalaye tharaga thiraka jawagal shrinathgen nila washayen likhithawa wimasimak karana bawa jayawardhana kiya siti.tharagaya yali aarambha nokaranne pitiye thibena thaththwaya asadharana bawata thamata ha pitiye tharaga winisuruwan wana pol rayifal ha marayis irasmusta hangunu nisa bawa shrinath pawasa thibe.

pethsamkaru mulika ayithiwasikam pethsamak sheshtradikaranaye gonu karamin ohuge 11 wana waganthiye sadahan mulika ayithiwasikam kadawu bawath ee nisa rupiyal laksha dekaka wandiyak himiwiya yuthu bawath prakasha karana ladi. 1993 juni 03 eyata awasara labini. 1993 agosthu 24 eya wibagayata thabu awasthawe adhikaranayata prakasha kerune pethsamkaru pethsama illa askara ganna bawath hethema adhikaranayen pitathadi polis niladariya samaga ekagathawak athi kara gena athi bawathya.

namuth warthamanaye wadima rogin pirisak paminenne diyawadiya rogaya sadaha prathikara laba ganimatayi.rohal wala asadhya thaththwayata path wi siti rogin da mohu athin suwa wi thibenawa.thawada anshabhaga rogayata da mema wedathuma prathikara karanawa.mohu wisin roga sadaha paramparika rahas wattoru walata anuwa sakasunu churna warga ,arishta,guli,kalka roginta laba denawa.mohuge wedakam walin rogaya nittawatama suwa karayi.
